page.title: 05 CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
Chain Tag was brought to Winsham School by Martin Richards.There are two people on it.They hold hands and try to catch the others.When they catch two people they hold hands and they are on it as well.They go on catching people until there are only two people left.Then you start again and they are on it.
British Bulldog is an old game.There are two people on it.They shout 1.2.3. British Bulldog and the others try to run past them.When you catch someone they have to say British Bulldog.
Poison is a game where two people are on it and all the rest run.If you get caught you open out your legs.When someone goes under them you are free. {By Jeremy Sparks & Craig Salter
